Title: expression Blend 4.0 Comment Uncomment Xaml Code Extension
Description:
BlendShortCuts Extension makes it easier for blend users to comment and uncomment xaml code. you'll no longer have to insert tag <!-- --> just press ALt+C and ALT+U
it's developed in c# (.Net framework 4.0, microsoft expression library)
HomeWiki:
Project Description
BlendShortCuts Extension makes it easier for blend users to comment and uncomment xaml code. you'll no longer have to insert tag <!-- --> just press ALt+C and ALT+U
it's developed in c# (.Net framework 4.0, microsoft expression library)

Requirements

  • .NET Framework 4
  • Expression Blend 4 SP1


Extension version 1.1 available Here
Source version 1.1  available Here

You can easily change hotkeys in the source code

 //set hotkeys
 HotKeys.Add(Keys.Alt, Keys.C, "comment");
 HotKeys.Add(Keys.Alt, Keys.U, "uncomment");

Solved issues
Now working in splitview mode too!!
New Features
Created toolbar to comment/uncomment
